sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"转动，旋转"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: rotate, revolve, roll, spin, turn, whirl, circle
means: rotate ： 侧重指物体围绕自己的轴或中心旋转，即自转。
revolve ： 强调指物体围绕本身以外的中心旋转，即公转。
roll ： 指某物在平面上滚动或翻滚。
spin ： 指沿内轴迅速而连续旋转，或沿外部一个点作快速圆周运转。
turn ： 普通用词，中性，含义不确切，可指作一个圆周运动或连续地作圆周运动，也可指仅是沿圆的弧形转动。
whirl ： 指旋转或作圆周运动，侧重急速或力量。

word_mean: 〔使〕转动，〔使〕旋转：使之绕轴转动

sentence.Network_en: With a low-pitched rumbling noise, the propeller began to rotate.
sentence.Network_cn: 伴随着隆隆的低沉噪声，螺旋桨开始旋转起来。

sentence.Network_en: Rotate the head clockwise and counterclockwise.
sentence.Network_cn: 按顺时针方向转动头部，然后再逆时针旋转。

sentence.Network_en: Rotate the shoulders in their sockets five times.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: from Latin rotat- 'turned in a circle', from the verb rotare, from rota 'wheel'

entry.def: When something rotates or when you rotate it, it turns with a circular movement.

example.ex: The Earth rotates round the sun...
Take each foot in both your hands and rotate it to loosen and relax the ankle.
example.tran: 双手抓住自己的双脚，转动一下，以放松脚踝。

entry.def: If people or things rotate, or if someone rotates them, they take it in turns to do a particular job or serve a particular purpose.

example.ex: The members of the club can rotate and one person can do all the preparation for the evening...
example.tran: 俱乐部的成员可以轮流工作，而且一个人就能做好晚上的所有准备工作。

example.ex: They will swap posts in a year's time, according to new party rules which rotate the leadership.
example.tran: 根据轮流担任领导的新政党章程，他们在一年后会轮换职位。

means.word_mean: 1. turn on or around an axis or a center;

sentences.sentence: "The lamb roast rotates on a spit over the fire"
"We rotate the lead soprano every night"

means.word_mean: 3. cause to turn on an axis or center;
4. perform a job or duty on a rotating basis;

sentences.sentence: "Interns have to rotate for a few months"
"These birds can splay out their toes"
"ballet dancers can rotate their legs out by 90 degrees"

means.word_mean: 6. plant or grow in a fixed cyclic order of succession;

sentences.sentence: "We rotate the crops so as to maximize the use of the soil"

auth_sentence.content: But they can certainly rotate faster as they collapse.
auth_sentence.res_content: But they can certainly rotate faster as they collapse.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But they can certainly rotate faster as they collapse.

auth_sentence.content: Every time you rotate the page it flips!
auth_sentence.res_content: Every time you rotate the page it flips!
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Every time you rotate the page it flips!

auth_sentence.content: The flywheels rotate at x revolutions per minute.
auth_sentence.res_content: The flywheels rotate at x revolutions per minute.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The flywheels rotate at x revolutions per minute.

stems_affixes.word_buile: rot轮子,转,滚+ary表形容词→adj.旋转的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 旋转的,转动的;循环的;交替的
stems_affixes.word_buile: rotate[v.[使]旋转]+ory……的→adj.旋转的,转动的;循环的;交替的
rot轮子,转,滚+und→转一圈→圆的,胖的

stems_affixes.value_cn: [机]转子, 回转轴, 转动体
stems_affixes.word_buile: rot轮子,转,滚+or物器→n.[机]转子, 回转轴, 转动体
rotund圆胖的+ity表名词→n.球状,圆形
rot轮子,转,滚+ate表动词→v.[使]旋转

sentences.en: The earth rotates around the sun.
The doctor asked the patient to rotate his eyes.
sentences.cn: 医生叫病人转动一下眼球。

means.word_mean: (使某人或某物)轮流[按顺序循环]

sentences.en: The post of chairman rotates among members of the committee.
sentences.cn: 主席一职由委员会的成员轮流担任。

sentences.en: You can rotate the wheel with your hand.

jushi.english: Wheels, tops and the earth rotate.
jushi.chinese: 轮子,陀螺和地球均旋转。

jushi.english: The earth rotates once every 24 hours.
